#Text=Celebrate National Dog Day
#Text=The national dog day , celebrated on August 26 , is a celebration of dog owners to inspire the spirit of dog-loving and respecting , showing gratitude and honoring our special pet – the dog .
#Text=This furry friend is not only our playmate or guide but a lively friend who can inspire people with disabilities .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Understand the celebrations .
#Text=National Dog Day was first coined by Colleen Paige , an animal lover , in 2004 .
#Text=It is celebrated by dog lovers to create awareness about adopting dogs and to show concern about the unsafe conditions of some dogs .
#Text=Advocate for dogs rights .
#Text=Although this can be done at any time of year , we can take specific actions to make the day more colorful and important .
#Text=Some ideas are :
#Text=Take care of rescued dogs .
#Text=You can do this by heading to your local animal shelter and volunteering .
#Text=You might end up deciding to volunteer on a permanent basis .
#Text=Buy treats or make homemade treats for rescue dogs .
#Text=Many animal shelters will accept these as donations , but check on their website to be sure .
#Text=Send dog-related gifts to friends or family members .
#Text=You could even buy gifts for your dog !
#Text=For example , a new toy , or a water bowl .
#Text=Look online for dog-related gifts , and buy them for friends , family , or even their dogs !
#Text=Go to dog-related events if they are being held in your area .
#Text=Community groups or individuals may throw a dog party for all the dogs in the area .
#Text=If there are n't , why not set one up yourself ?
#Text=You could advertise on social media , and buy treats and toys for all the dogs .
#Text=Write about your furry friend , either on a blog or on social media .
#Text=You could post funny pictures , videos or jokes about your dog , or just write about how much you love them .
#Text=Treat your dog .
#Text=You know your dog best , do something you know they will like .
#Text=You could give your dog a spa day , go to the park and play ball , there are loads of options !
#Text=Try to either buy or cook something delicious for your dog and make the day enjoyable for him .
#Text=Understand the danger some dogs are in .
#Text=Most dogs are lucky to have a home and good food , but we should do best for those furry friends who have no home and are without care .
#Text=They are in the shelters or languishing in the wilderness and are prone to serious risk of starvation , sickness , suffering from severe disease , and even death .
#Text=Consider ways to help these dogs .
#Text=Consider donating to a charity that helps animals if you can .
#Text=If you ca n't adopt or donate , spread the message in person and online .
#Text=One of your friends or family members might be able to help .
